mapper.select: SELECT M.MARKET_NO AS marketNo, M.MARKET_TITLE AS marketTitle, M.USER_ID AS userId, U.USER_NAME AS userName, M.MARKET_DATE AS marketDate, M.MARKET_STATUS AS marketStatus, M.IS_HIDDEN AS isHidden FROM TB_MARKET M JOIN TB_USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY M.MARKET_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
